attributes.action: Please re-consider  proposed cuts to the Royal Navy
attributes.additional_details:
For hundreds of years the British Royal Navy has built up a capability  to go anywhere in the world,  and to protect  our maritime trade, and our citizens, and our allies.

Please  do not  dispose by sale or scrappage our Aircraft  and Helicopter Carriers.   Please consider a plan  to maintain de-commissioned  Carriers in a Reserve Fleet, capable of being Re-commissioned at say one months notice of mobilisation.
Equally, please retain the services of the Officers and other ranks  with the professional skills to operate those Carriers.
